response.overview: To Be Found Faithful is a documentary about the history of Dawson Memorial Baptist Church, released for its 100th anniversary. This film features multiple members of the church's congregation recounting the rich history of this Alabama church, and the impact it has made on their lives, along with the lives of many others around the world
response.tagline: A Celebration of Dawson's Centennial anniversary
response.title: To Be Found Fathful
